dc.title: Thorium Reader for Desktop user's guide (English, 3.2)
dc.creator: The European Digital Reading Lab
dc.description: This is the official Thorium Reader for Desktop 3.2 documentation. It offers guidance to help you get to know and make better use of Thorium Reader. Quick support references are not included here and are available online from the Thorium Support webpages.
dc.rights: Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike (CC BY-SA) license.

description: Thorium Reader is a versatile digital book reader and library management tool.
